title: My champion freezes every 30-40 seconds what is happening?
body:
So this has happened to me a lot recently:

I'm playing the game and suddently my champion just stops moving or stop following any order I give and keep walking to the direction I clicked before it started to bug. I have no FPS or ping changes, my ping pretty much stays at 46 all the time and my FPS are around 150, but every 30-40-50 seconds or so I just lose control of my champion. Everything around still moves, but my champion freezes and won't cast spells/move/auto attack or do anything I tell it to do. It's very frustrating and sometime I die because I clicked undertower just to walk close to it but my champions keeps moving and I can't stop it, or sometime I get attacked and litteraly cannot do anything but watch myself die. The freezes last for about 1-3 seconds but thats enough to lose a fight... Is there any solution to this problem?

replies.body: It sounds like you're having lag spikes or a network issue, and not necessarily fps.  When you have some time, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these matches to really know for sure.  Let me know what you find!

Ping isn't the problem it seems to be about Packet loss overtime (wich I have no idea what that is lol)...

EDIT: I'm on windows 10 I know there is a lot of issues on this version of window maybe It is due to this... When I'm on internet sometime my page will freeze and I have to close my browser for it to work again but on any other device in my house I don't have any internet problems...
